jobDescription: Job ID: CP-1024727 Description:BASIC FUNCTION This position is part of the Client Analytics division and the candidate will be responsible for the client-facing data and analytics engagements for some of BCBSIL's largest clients. The candidate will preferably have Executive-Level presentation experience or a proven track record of conveying complex ideas to a diverse audience via data visualization. The candidate will analyze financial and health data to determine health care expenditures, medical and economic outcomes, and cost containment strategies. Ideally the candidate will possess the ability to think critically and work independently (as well as within a team) in order to analyze complex problems and issues using large data sets; and have a penchant for creative thinking as well as a desire to improve the healthcare landscape for BCBSIL's most innovative clients. JOB REQUIREMENTSBachelor Degree and 3 years experience in health care services, statistical analysis, or insurance industry economics OR 7 years experience in health care services, statistical analysis, or insurance industry economics.Requires in-depth knowledge and experienceUses best practices and knowledge of internal or external business issues to improve products or servicesIndependently solves complex problems; takes a new perspective using existing solutionsWorks independently, receives minimal guidanceActs as a resource for colleagues with less experience; may direct the work of other staff membersPREFERRED REQUIREMENTS: Preference will be given to applicants with the following knowledge, skills, experience, or education: MBA or Bachelor Degree in Mathematics, Actuarial Science, Statistics, Finance, or AccountingAnalyzing and making recommendations around healthcare benefits;Understanding or experience with underwriting and/or actuarial practices;Ability to articulate depth and breadth of expertise in the following: Analytical thinking, communication for results, conceptual thinking, information seeking, initiative, openness to learning, results orientation, teamwork, data visualization, thoroughness, and understanding environment.Tableau experiencePresentation experience This position is based in Chicago, IL.
